feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping landing‑page styling and text‑translation updates to affected React files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend React components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH variable definitions for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with metadata and script mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/landing/BookingS: Booking form that validates inputs and opens a WhatsApp prefilled message.
frontend/src/components/landing/Coverage: Displays high‑level coverage text for Ahmedabad and Gandhinagar.
frontend/src/components/landing/Floating: Floating WhatsApp quick‑action button fixed at screen bottom‑right.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Hero block with blue gradient background, tagline, and WhatsApp/Call CTAs.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingF: Footer with branding, contact shortcuts, copyright, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingN: Sticky white nav bar with branded title and smooth‑scroll Book Now button.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes all landing sections into a full page layout.
frontend/src/components/landing/OurWorkS: Gallery showing two AC cleaning examples with images and captions.
frontend/src/components/landing/Services: Grid of four AC service cards with icons and English descriptions.
frontend/src/components/ServiceAreasSect: Lists service areas in three bordered cards with an English footnote.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context/provider and hook for managing identities, login flow, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes, layout, and custom color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and components using CSS variables and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Project metadata summarizing features, versions, and implemented components for the marketing website and ICP setup.
